name: respond-with-another-site
description: Respond to a request with the response from another site

scripts.build: knitwit --out-dir build/wit/knitwit --out-world combined && npx webpack --mode=production && npx mkdirp dist && npx j2w -i build/bundle.js -d build/wit/knitwit -n combined -o dist/respond-with-another-site.wasm
